textAfterTable: 4 Songs Customer Reviews ASG           by tmski12 Love ASG and this is sick, wish they would come out with a new album or ep soon! I love going to there shows and these songs have that crisp classic ASG sound and guitar riffs Biography Formed: 2001 in Wilmington, NC Genre: Rock Years Active: '00s, '10s Based out of Wilmington, North Carolina, hard-hitting Southern rockers ASG formed in 2001 around the talents of Jason Shi (vocals, guitar), Andy Ellis (bass), Scott Key (drums), and Jonah Citty (guitar). The quartet, who employ a muscular blend of punk, southern rock, and alt/stoner metal that has drawn comparisons to artist like Queens of the Stone Age, Torche, and Tool, self-released their eponymous debut/demo in 2002 before inking a deal with Volcom Entertainment and issuing their official debut,...
